plot: Experience the point of view of a traffic policeman as he complains how the people of Dhaka have made breaking the rules a habit.
title: Dhaka Stories: Bitter Lemon
plot_es: Experience the point of view of a traffic policeman as he complains how the people of Dhaka have made breaking the rules a habit.
plot_en: Experience the point of view of a traffic policeman as he complains how the people of Dhaka have made breaking the rules a habit.
